item.title: Journeys through the Radiant Citadel Magic Item
item.content:encoded:
Just posting this here just to keep track of the new additions.

I've created and updated all related pages for the magic item in Journeys through Radiant Citadel.

Hammock of Worlds - http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/wondrous-items:hammock-of-worlds
